effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This damage can't be reduced in any way. This ability can't be used again until the start of the next round.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The war engine moves up to their speed in a straight line, automatically destroying mundane size 1 objects or walls in their path. The first time the war engine moves through a creature's space during this movement, that creature can choose to either fall prone or take 10 damage.

items.name: Burning Oil
items.target: Each enemy and object in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target makes an Agility test.
effects.tier1: 16 fire damage; the target is burning (save ends)
effects.tier2: 12 fire damage; the target is burning (EoT)

effects.effect: A burning creature takes 1d6 fire damage at the start of each of their turns. A burning object takes 1d6 fire damage at the end of each round. Additionally, the area is burning until the end of the encounter. While the area is burning, it is difficult terrain and any enemy takes 3 fire damage for each square of the area they enter.

items.name: Quick Blast
items.trigger: The target deals damage to the war engine.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This damage can't be reduced in any way.
The war engine ignores difficult terrain, and their abilities deal an extra 15 damage to objects.
The war engine's shape can't be changed by any external effect.
While the war engine isn't bleeding, weakened, or winded, any power roll made against them is automatically a tier 1 outcome. A critical hit still grants its additional main action.
